short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds users to do Kegel exercises with customizable timers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your personal guide to building stronger pelvic floor muscles!

Take charge of your health with KegelKeeper, a smart Chrome extension designed to remind and guide you through Kegel exercises effortlessly. Whether you're looking to strengthen your core, improve bladder control, or just make Kegel exercises a part of your daily routine, KegelKeeper has you covered.

Why Install KegelKeeper?

- Customizable Workouts: Set your preferred hold and release times, as well as the number of 
  cycles.
- Friendly Reminders: Stay consistent with daily or interval-based reminders.
  Interactive Guidance: Track your progress with a visual circular bar and optional sound cues.
- Simple and Effective: Clean, user-friendly design ensures anyone can get started in seconds.

Make Kegel exercises a habit today with KegelKeeperâ€”your health deserves it!
